import style from './Features.module.css' import photoSecond from '../photos/photoSecond.png' import photoFeartMan from '../photos/photoFeartMan.png' import photoCrossFit from '../photos/photoCrossFit.png' import photoGroup from '../photos/photoGroup.png' import LineRedHorr from '../../UI/LineRedHorr' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' const Features = () => { const [scrollTop, setScrollTop] = useState(0) const handleScroll = (event) => { setScrollTop(event.currentTarget.scrollTop) } window.addEventListener('click', function () { return let position = this.window.scrollY + 'px' console.log(position) }) return ( <>

) } export default Features
